creator: erenar@gmail.com
text:
Apache MSI Installer does not always check the "Network Domain", "Server Name" 
and "Administrator's Email" fields during the installation. The bug is valid 
for Apache 2.0.58 and 2.2.2 installation packages.

Bug 41220 had a useful subject name, duplicating to that incident


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 41220 ***
creator: wrowe@apache.org
